definition: the usual weather conditions in a place over time
example_sentence: A desert climate stays dry most of the year.

definition: a number that names part of a whole
example_sentence: One fraction of the pizza was left.

definition: the natural home of a plant or animal
example_sentence: A pond is a frog habitat.

definition: the curved path of an object in space
example_sentence: Earth moves in an orbit around the sun.

definition: a series of steps to do something
example_sentence: Writing is a process with many drafts.

definition: to say what will happen next
example_sentence: We predict rain from dark clouds.

definition: to look for similarities and differences
example_sentence: Compare the two graphs.

definition: a group of related sentences about one main idea
example_sentence: Each paragraph has one main idea.

definition: the rules for using words in a language
example_sentence: Good grammar helps readers understand.

definition: to take, hold, or record something
example_sentence: The camera can capture fast action.

definition: an unusual and exciting experience
example_sentence: Our camping trip felt like an adventure.

definition: the shared beliefs and customs of a group
example_sentence: Food is part of culture.

definition: planned work done over time
example_sentence: Our science project tested plant growth.

definition: to look at something again
example_sentence: Review your notes before the quiz.

definition: to play again
example_sentence: We hit replay on the short video.

definition: to move people or things from one place to another
example_sentence: Buses transport students to school.

definition: being friendly and caring to others
example_sentence: Kindness makes classrooms feel safe.

definition: feeling or showing hope
example_sentence: She felt hopeful about the test.

definition: a change in position
example_sentence: The sensor detected movement.

definition: a person who helps students learn
example_sentence: The teacher explained the plan.

definition: paying close attention to avoid mistakes
example_sentence: Be careful with the glass.

definition: to write again with changes
example_sentence: I will rewrite my opening paragraph.

definition: to have a different opinion
example_sentence: I disagree with that idea.

definition: to look at something before full use
example_sentence: We watched a preview of the film.

definition: a tool that makes very small things look bigger
example_sentence: The microscope showed the cells.

definition: the ability to do work or make things happen
example_sentence: Running uses a lot of energy.

definition: the amount of rain that falls in a place
example_sentence: Rainfall was high this spring.

definition: to join things together
example_sentence: Combine the ingredients in a bowl.

definition: to make an idea clear
example_sentence: Can you explain your answer?

definition: facts or information that show something is true
example_sentence: Use evidence from the text.
